extendedInfo.description: MEGA is a secure cloud storage service that gives you 50GB of secure storage for free. Everything you upload to MEGA is completely encrypted, and the keys stay with you.You can find out more details, or sign up for an account from MEGA at https://mega.co.nz/The MEGA App for Android is a native Android interface to the MEGA service. It allows you to browse your files, upload and download, search and more.Here are the current features:- Browse your MEGA storage account- Fast upload and download files from your Android device- Camera Sync, upload your photos and videos to MEGA automatically- Search for files within your MEGA account- Create public link to files in your MEGA account- Download - Delete files- Rename files- Move files- Create folders

reviews.title: Not happy at all...
reviews.comment: Cant upload anything......and while uploading anything the uploading bar sometimes show that more mbs have been uploaded n a min later lesser mbs have been uploaded.....what is this?? Please fix otherwise  that 50 gb is useless to me
reviews.author: junaid naseer

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Only way to find stuff downloaded to the internal cache is to downloaded a root explorer and search the file name That has downloaded to the internal cache works flawless though plus 50gb!!
reviews.author: Asif Saleem

reviews.title: Forceclose after Forceclose
reviews.comment: Worked great for the first month or so. Now I can\'t even upload a photo. After the prompt to upload, mega just shuts down. Cmon guys!
reviews.author: lance johnson

reviews.title: Cannot download from mega...at all!!
reviews.comment: Registered 3 sesperate times with different mails.. Verified account, went to login... Guess what `password` in correct EVERY SINGLE TIME!!! No password reset option = absolutely rubbish and frustrating app and website.
reviews.author: mike fiera

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: If MEGA have resume option it will be great app!

reviews.title: Internal cache
reviews.comment: Please tell me where is the internal chache\'s location I have to delete some content and I cant find it. Please help very good app

reviews.title: Download status won\'t show on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: My 2012 N7 won\'t show how downloads are coming along, the icon on the top bar is there but sliding reveals nothing. And for some reason, my mobile data on my S3 is more reliable than WiFi.
reviews.author: Ben Arneault

reviews.comment: The app frequently crashes and it stops responding. Huge waste of time and effort. Useless App. I WANT TO GIVE 5 STAR NEGATIVE RATING. BUT THERE IS NO OPTION LIME THAT.\tUse less app. It will stop responding after installation on my SGS3.
reviews.author: Suresh Reddy

reviews.title: forceclose all the time.
reviews.comment: it used to work in the past. not working now because it foreclose 5 seconds after opening the app. please fix for 5 stars.

reviews.title: Cannot Upload!!
reviews.comment: I canno upload my video (100mb + mkv) with this app. It sometime show 20+mb already uploaded but then reverted back to 1mb.please fix that

reviews.comment: Hey guys. This is a very awesome app. It just need one more option in the mobile app. Do you think you can put the option to delete the rubbish can in the app? That way I will not need to go to your site from my browser and dump it.
